title: Redskins will wear throwback uniforms vs. 49ers
text:
The Washington Redskins are breaking out their throwback uniforms when they play the San Francisco 49ers at FedEx Field Sunday.

The team’s Twitter account gives fans an up-close preview of the throwbacks, which they usually wear once a year for their Homecoming Game.

In addition to the darker shades of burgundy and gold, the helmet features a retro version of their primary logo.

The annual alternate uniform is a spinoff of what the Redskins wore in the 1930s when they first moved to Washington.
